fullplot: Cher, a high school student in Beverly Hills, must survive the ups and downs of adolescent life. Her external demeanor at first seems superficial, but rather it hides her wit, charm, and intelligence which help her to deal with relationships, friends, family, school, and the all-important teenage social life.
plot: A rich high school student tries to boost a new pupil's popularity, but reckons without affairs of the heart getting in the way.
title: Clueless
